workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage database instance and memory for Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Shut down and start up database instance
tutorials.description: How to shut down and start up an Oracle instance using SQL commands and Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (EM)

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Manage initialization parameters
tutorials.description: How to to view and modify initialization parameters in Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (EM) to specify the properties of the database instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Automatic Memory Management
tutorials.description: How to enable Automatic Memory Management for Oracle Database from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (EM) and SQL command line.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
